mixed-citation.article-title: Revision of Ganomymar De Santis, 1972, a remarkable genus of Mymaridae (Hymenoptera, Chalcidoidea) from Madagascar

tp:treatment-sec.p:
Ganomymar dessarti De Santis, 1972: 2–3
(type locality: unknown, except being in Madagascar ( De Santis 1972 )). Holotype female [RBINS], dry-mounted except for one antenna and one fore wing mounted on a slide in Faure’s liquid ( De Santis 1972 ), examined during a visit in June 1997 .

Ganomymar dessarti
is a member of the
dessarti
species group. Females differ from those of
G. libertatium
by the diagnostic features given in the key.
